about_the_game:
Beginner's Pack

This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors.
It's a cute yellow outfit suitable for beginners.

The Beginner's Pack includes the following items:

Beginner's Hat
Beginner's Outfit
Beginner's Gloves
Beginner's Sneakers
Beginner's Doll
Beginner's Headphones

How to apply a Skin to Equipment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 TI
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
